Description: Condition: This is a mint condition open box model. Pictures reflect the actual instrument, so you can buy with confidence. As you can see this particular guitar has a really cool color fade that includes a unique blend of blue and green in the center. Buyer can add a Guardian CG-020-E Hardshell Case for just $69 more. Description: The top-of-the-line of the KX Series, the KX500FF ups the ante with its 648~685mm (25.5~27") multi-scale neck and EMG 707 soapbar humbuckers mounted at an angle. Featuring boutique-level materials like Poplar Burl on Swamp Ash body, 5-piece Maple and Purple Heart neck and Macassar Ebony fretboard and individual bridge for each string, the KX500FF can go from over-the-top brutal to a sweet purr to cover a wide range of musical styles and genres. 7-Sting Multi Scale: The multi-scale construction produces a more defined, punchier, tighter and deeper low end – especially on the low-B and low-E strings. Poplar Burl on Swamp Ash: The strikingly figured Poplar Burl top and Swamp Ash complement each other perfectly to produce a warm yet punchy high-midrange sound that will cut through the mix with authority. 5-pc Neck: The 5-piece Maple and Purple Heart neck not only provides strength and stability but a strong and focused sound in conjunction with the body’s acoustic resonance. EMG 707 Pickups: The EMG 707 has established itself as a trend-setting industry standard for 7-string electric guitars. Loud, clear, articulate, sensitive and powerful, the EMG 707 can do it all. Individual Hard-Tails with String-Thru Design: Individual hardtail bridge unit for each string that feeds through the body results in greatly improved sustain, superb string separation for greater articulation and precise intonation. Macassar Ebony Fingerboard: Very similar to Rosewood in both looks and sound, the Macassar Ebony produces a deep rich sound with sweet yet cutting highs. The new “Raindrop” fingerboard inlay designed specifically for this model provides a distinctive look. Locking Machine Heads: Locking machine heads provide excellent tuning stability and facilitate quick string changes. Specificaitons: Body: Swamp Ash w/ Poplar Burl Top Neck: 5PC Maple & Purple Heart Binding: Black Fretboard: Macassar Ebony (400mm Radius) Frets: 24 Scale: Multi-Scale, 648~685mm (25.5 ~ 27") Tuners: Locking Bridge: Single Hardtail w/ String-Thru Body Pickups: EMG 707 Electronics: 1 Volume, 1 Tone, 3 Way Toggle Switch Hardware: Black Nickel Strings: D'Addario YB EXL 110 & NW059 Buyers can use the shipping calculator to compare a variety of rates and services. APO/FPO/DPO addresses may incur additional costs. Michigan residents are required to pay 6% sales tax. Returns are accepted in accordance with the terms listed in our return policy. Be sure to check out the FairSquare Music store for more great items. Thanks for shopping with us and have a great day!
Title: Cort KX500FF Multi-Scale 7-String Fanned Fret EMG Pickups Star Dust Green Fade
